video.title: Children of Adam
video.synopsis: Amid crime and corruption, the lives of two couples intertwine as unexpected events soon reveal their dark secrets and tainted pasts.

episodes.synopsis: Distraught after yet another miscarriage, Dima is further plunged into a moral dilemma. Saad and Maya's first encounter descends into panic.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Tensions arise after Maya discovers Saad's unconventional vocation. Faced with a complicated situation, Dima and Ghassan offer their assistance.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Dima feels conflicted about news revealed at a dinner party and confides in the hostess Safa. Maya and Saad connect over a luckless incident.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: In need of a quick buck to help her imprisoned sister, Maya resorts to shady stunts. Dima receives unsettling news from the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Dima tries to get pregnant again as Ghassan continues to be immersed in troubling ventures. A misunderstanding shakes up Maya's trust in Saad.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Ghassan's past starts to unravel. Safa warns Dima about investigating a powerful businessman for a drug-smuggling case. Maya gets framed.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When all fails, Maya seeks Saad's help. After receiving devastating news, Dima turns to Ghassan for support and reveals a family secret.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Dima faces the repercussions of her brother's misdoing, and Safa agrees to a lucrative but risky offer. Zeina's situation behind bars deteriorates.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Khalil seeks Ghassan's help as Dima continues to investigate Khalil's connection to the case. Saad opens up to Maya about his troubled childhood.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Ghassan is promoted at work, and Dima deals with her brother's sudden return from France. After an unfortunate accident, Maya turns to Saad for refuge.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Hisham falls off the wagon as Dima's investigation hits a roadblock. A troubled teen seeks Ghassan's help.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Hisham and Dima's relationship is further strained. Ghassan presents Nour with a potential solution to her dilemma. Maya and Saad play house.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a troubling phone call, Dima deals with a tragic loss. Ghassan takes Nour's story public. Zeina gets advice from an unlikely source.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: In mourning, Dima resigns ahead of a grand announcement but is soon tasked with a new scandal. Ghassan abuses Nour's gratitude. Zeina reaches a new low.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Refusing to concede to Khalil's deceitful efforts, Dima opts to take the high road which, in turn, upsets Ghassan. Saad teaches Maya his craft.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: As he tries to reconnect with his past, Ghassan struggles with feelings of abandonment. For the first time, Maya becomes a pickpocket.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Zeina retaliates against Abla. Dima's suspicions grow after she and Ghassan are interrogated about Safa's murder. A revelation ups the stakes for Saad.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Dima searches for truths behind Ghassan's suspicious behavior. Maya's big news brings Saad's deeply-rooted insecurities to the surface.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Saad's doubts leave Maya heartbroken. Dima is forced to shut the door on her past when her marriage is threatened.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Bassam gives Maya harsh advice on maintaining her relationship. Dima starts her first day as the Minister of Justice as Ghassan anxiously awaits a call.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Hisham's condition starts improving at rehab. News from Damascus devastates Saad amid arguments with Maya. Later, Saad calls Ghassan with a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Saad forces Maya to abide by his choice with dire repercussions. Dima finally receives some good news. Ghassan reveals a dark truth to Wessam.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Saad opens up to Hala and bargains with Ghassan. A sudden murder complicates the drug-smuggling case. A gesture of kindness warms the women's prison.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After a major discovery, Maya seeks out Dima and presents her with a risky ultimatum. Meanwhile, Saad and Ghassan's exchange spirals into chaos.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Maya confides in a new acquaintance as she continues to hide from Saad. All hell breaks loose when Ghassan's true colors are revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Ghassan gives Khalil an attractive offer. Dima concedes to Maya's ultimatum and seeks out Nabil's help to execute the deal. Nour hits rock bottom.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Nabil agrees to help Dima break Zeina free from prison. After a major loss, a distraught Saad searches for Maya.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Saad and Maya reconnect. Dima and Ghassan's ex-wife compare stories as he fulfills his end of the bargain to Khalil, throwing Dima under the bus.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: With nothing left to lose, Ghassan goes to extreme lengths to recover his stolen phone. Maya and Saad face a threatening situation.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: After his plan goes awry, Ghassan disappears as Dima uses the opportunity to pursue justice. Saad and Maya shift their priorities.
episodes.title: Episode 30
